channel.title: RoxeScape v1
channel.description:
-----------ROXESCAPE v1-----------
Thank you DemisePking for the source... (Edgeville PK'ing)
Ok guys, I'm not gonna tell you much because I could care less if you download or not. Don't bitch whining about pictures because I will put some up but not now. Yes the client goes to my IP but you can change it I'm not advertising. This source just got soo terrible i couldn't stand it anymore. I Fixed the quest tab as it was fucked up very bad... I fixed Client's Anti-Leech I fixed sources Anti-Leech. One major problem is when you talk it shows up "ilhyohgfvds" and shit to the other player so I couldnt even chat to my players on the game -.- So I'm releasing if you fix it gratz you has a good server. If not, oh well.
Server- http://www.mediafire.com/?2mlk2p5d8974un0
Client- http://www.mediafire.com/?o4ybljm43vt2t32
Client Java Files- http://www.mediafire.com/?yv2uiy0hk5sr5cl
[b] A Few Server Features [/b] -Perfect Gmaul Spec -Dragon Claws, and spec. -All Godsword, stances, and specs. - Perfect combat system -Perfect Hybriding -DFS -Dark Bow Perfect -PvP Armors and Weapons (not vesta armor) -Thats all for now...
[b]Pictures[/b]-
[IMG]http://i1108.photobucket.com/albums/h411/ZerkedAgg/gmaulspec.gif[/img]
CREDITS -
Client: Demise, Me Server: Demise, Me

item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:3, topic:363956”]I have a few pointers to give :]

  1. Please post pics you will get a better chance of people downloading.
  2. Give percentages like 40% to me and 60% to demise because it tells us how much you coded and altered.
  3. Don’t be mean to the crowd because that is another way for people to down your rep and people will view you different with lower rep.
  4. Better description please.

That is about all i have to say about that lawl. other than that i can’t really say anything about it because to me it doesn’t sound like you did anything to the server, but please prove me wrong. :[][/quote]
If you do number 2 then all it does is cause flame war :L

Read full topic
